name: ClearMem :: Free Up Your RAM
description: ClearMem is a cutting-edge application that does 1 thing: Clears your RAM. You simply run the application and watch your RAM consumption drop considerably! ClearMem fully integrates with all Steam games as well as non-Steam games and applications!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Any CPU Memory: 150 MB RAM Graphics: Any semi-modern GPU Storage: 5 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Any CPU Memory: 150 MB RAM Graphics: Any semi-modern GPU Storage: 5 MB available space
